Package az.edu.ada.wm2.Assignment.repository

Interface AuthorRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Author,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Author,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Author,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Author,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Author,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Author>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Author,Integer>
@Repository public interface AuthorRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Author,Integer>
Repository interface for performing CRUD operations and filtering on Author entities.

  • Method Details

    • findAuthorsByFullNameContainingIgnoreCaseAndBirthYearAndNationality

      List<Author> findAuthorsByFullNameContainingIgnoreCaseAndBirthYearAndNationality(String fullName, Integer birthYear, String nationality)
      Finds authors by their full name, birth year, and nationality, ignoring case.
      Parameters:
      fullName - The full name of the author (partially matched), ignoring case.
      birthYear - The birth year of the author.
      nationality - The nationality of the author.
      Returns:
      List of authors matching the given criteria.

    • findAuthorsByFullNameContainingIgnoreCaseAndBirthYear

      Parameters:

      birthYear - The birth year of the author.
      Returns:
      List of authors matching the given criteria.

    • findAuthorsByBirthYear

      @Query("SELECT a FROM Author a WHERE a.birthYear = :birthYear") List<Author> findAuthorsByBirthYear(@Param("birthYear") int birthYear)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      List of authors matching the given criteria.

    • findAuthorsByNationality

      @Query(value="SELECT * FROM authors WHERE nationality = :nationality", nativeQuery=true) List<Author> findAuthorsByNationality(@Param("nationality") String nationality)
      Finds authors by their nationality.
      Parameters:
      nationality - The nationality of the author.
      Returns:
      List of authors matching the given criteria.
